title: Centrist Cheap Shots, Soak Your Bod In Pepsi 12.3.20
itunes:title: Centrist Cheap Shots, Soak Your Bod In Pepsi 12.3.20
description:
In episode 771, Jack and Miles are joined by Joey Clift to discuss establishment moderates vs progressives, Michael Flynn calling for a military coup, Georgia election officials condemning violent rhetoric on the right, the Pepsi-scented face mask, Melania's White House Christmas decorations, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Ocasio-Cortez hits back after Manchin criticism
  2. WATCH: Georgia elections official condemns violent rhetoric, calls on Trump to 'step up' | ABC News
  3. It Seems Bad That the Guy the President Just Pardoned Is Calling for Him to Execute a Military Coup
  4. Would you care to unwind with a Pepsi-scented face mask?
  5. Melania Trump's 2020 Christmas Decorations Are Unconventionally Traditional
  6. John F. Kennedy honored in this year's White House Christmas decorations
  7. QAnon Followers Think JFK Jr. Is Coming Back on the 4th of July
  8. Melania Trump and the Sexist Role of “First Lady”: Why Do We Still Even Have This?
  9. WATCH: Baths - Lovely Bloodflow

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
